text: 25|20|aur nahin bheja hamane aapase poorv kisee rasool ko, parantu ve bhojan karate aur baazaaron mein (bhee) chalate[1] phirate the tatha hamane bana diya tumamen se ek ko doosare ke lie pareeksha ka saadhan, to kya tum dhairy rakhoge? tatha aapaka paalanahaar sab kuchh dekhane[2] vaala hai.
